alert.note: Alert for Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:13PM CDT until April 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 413 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Diamond City, or 14 miles south of Forsyth, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Taneycomo, Bull Shoals Lake, Protem and Rueter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
